descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5]
[color=#ffffff][color=#ffff00]Azura's Shield[/color] for Skyrim v1.0 Eng/Rus[/color][/size][/color][/font][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=4]
[color=#00ffff]SE version is available[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12998/]HERE[/url]

[/size][/color][/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#1e84cc]
[/color][color=#ffff00]Authors:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, location

[color=#ffff00]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds new shield - Azura's Shield - that can be obtained in the Frost Haven Cave, that is Northwest from Winterhold.

[color=#ffff00]Shield stats:[/color]
Armor class: Heavy
Armor rating: 30
Weight: 12
Enchantment: Health, Stamina and Magicka restores 25% faster.
Improvement: Ebony ingot, optimal perk - Ebony smithing.


[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]
[/size][/font]
author: Ronnie Magnum
